result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant MILES MARLOW WEBER in court.  Attorney Brianne Patzer for Attorney Ty Gasparek in court for MILES MARLOW WEBER.  Prosecuting attorney Tucker T. Tellefson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Adj. requested.  Bond continues.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: No contact with V1 in OPD report 22-30386 or their residence. Defendant does acknowledge they've been advised who the victim(s) is/are. Take medications prescribed by physician as prescribed. May pick up belongings one time accompanied by police escort once 72 hour no contact is no longer in effect, provided there are no other court orders prohibiting contact. Absolute sobriety. No alcohol consumption or possession. No use or possession of controlled substances, unless prescribed by a physician.   No possession of drug paraphernalia.

3:34 PM Defendant MILES MARLOW WEBER appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Nicole A Morley & Kou Thao appeared by video for MILES MARLOW WEBER.  Prosecuting attorney Tucker T. Tellefson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Given/has complaint. Waive reading. Advised of rights. The defendant authorized the Court to send text message reminders of upcoming court hearings. The Court did confirm with the State that they are in compliance with Marsy's Law. The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement. Record closed @ 342
